Content.Text:
<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh. Well, aren't you a love? What's your
name? Hmm, you seem like a stray. Maybe you
don't have one?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, how 'bout...<MYNAME>, maybe.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You're sweet like <MYNAME>, you love people
like <MYNAME>, you love attention like
<MYNAME>...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha... <MYNAME>, that tickles!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Geez, what am I saying?
<PAGE>
Yeah, now that I think about it, I probably
shouldn't name a cat after my girlfriend. Hmm,
some other name...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
WAH!! <MYNAME>! Wh-when did you get here?
Did you, um...did you hear what I said...?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm sorry! I didn't mean it. It's just, ah...you
seemed kinda similar, and I wanted to see how it
sounded, and, um...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Uh... Oh, I-I know! How about YOU help me
think up a name for this little kitty?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Which one do you like?
Francois.
Margaret.
Tanaka.
Kamil.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Francois? Yeah, that's a good one. It's cute.
Margaret...! Where are you?

Aha! There you are, Margaret. I've been looking
all over for you. Did these nice people play with
you?

I'm sorry. I hope my cat didn't bother you too
much.
<PAGE>
Come on, Margaret. Let's go home. Say "bye"
now...
Have a good day.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh. So that kitty wasn't a stray. She didn't have
a collar, so I'd thought she was.
<PAGE>
No wonder she was so friendly.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I guess her name really was Margaret, too. That's
a cute name. I like it. And she's got a nice
owner.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I only got to play with the kitty for a little bit, but
I already miss having her around. Maybe I'll see
her sometime later.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yeah, you're right. I'm sure I will. It's strange.
Hearing you say it makes me think I'll see her real
soon.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh. I already can't wait. Anyways, I should
be going. See you later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
True. She's all white and cute, and "Margaret"
can mean "Daisy," you know. Yeah, I think that's
a great name.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow. Her name actually was Margaret.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You really did guess that kitty's name,
<MYNAME>. That's amazing! Do you speak cat
or something?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh. Just kidding.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So that kitty wasn't a stray. She didn't have a
collar, so I'd thought she was.
<PAGE>
No wonder she was so friendly.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, um, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you have some free time to chat some more?
<PAGE>
I mean, the kitty's gone home now, but that
doesn't mean you have to, right?
<PAGE>
You just got here, so no need to head out right
away.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Tanaka...? I've never really heard that name
before. It sounds kinda...avant-garde, I guess.
<PAGE>
I dunno. I don't think it fits this kitty very well.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I said I was sorry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>If you're just going to make jokes about it, I'll
figure out a name on my own.
<PAGE>
And I won't make it yours, so you don't have to
worry on that point. See you later, <MYNAME>.
